message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this product to you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to make a great deal. My initial offer is $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your effort in valuing the product. However, based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay up to $1100000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a compromise. My counteroffer is $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1150000 for the product. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another concession. My counteroffer is $1225000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in adjusting your offer. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1175000 for the product. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
